about.title: About
about.appDescription: PSC Exam Prep is a comprehensive preparation platform for Nepal's Public Service Commission examinations. Practice questions, take mock tests, track your progress, and compete with fellow aspirants â€” all in one app.
about.featurePractice: Practice questions by category with detailed explanations
about.featureMockTests: Timed mock tests that simulate real exam conditions
about.featureBilingual: Full bilingual support in English and Nepali
about.featureLeaderboard: Leaderboard to compete with other aspirants
about.featureAnalytics: Detailed analytics to track your progress
about.featureCommunity: Community contributions to grow the question bank
about.copyright: Â© 2025 PSC Exam Prep. All rights reserved.

guidelines.title: Contribution Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Write quality questions
guidelines.introText: Follow these guidelines to ensure your questions are approved quickly and help fellow PSC aspirants prepare effectively.
guidelines.doOriginalDesc: Create questions from your own knowledge or official PSC syllabus materials
guidelines.doBilingualDesc: Write question text in both English and Nepali for maximum accessibility
guidelines.doExplanationDesc: Add a clear explanation for why the correct answer is right
guidelines.doAccurateDesc: Double-check facts, dates, and correct answers before submitting
guidelines.doRelevantDesc: Focus on topics covered in the PSC exam syllabus
guidelines.dontCopyDesc: Avoid copying questions directly from books or websites without modification
guidelines.dontAmbiguousDesc: Make sure the question and options are clear and unambiguous
guidelines.dontDuplicateDesc: Search existing questions before submitting to avoid duplicates
guidelines.dontIncompleteDesc: Fill in all required fields including all four answer options
guidelines.step1: Write a clear, specific question in both English and Nepali
guidelines.step2: Select the appropriate category for your question
guidelines.step3: Provide exactly 4 answer options and mark the correct one
guidelines.step4: Add an explanation for the correct answer (recommended)
guidelines.step5: Review everything and submit for review
guidelines.reviewText: All submitted questions go through a review process by our moderators. You'll be notified when your question is approved or if changes are needed. Quality questions are made public and contribute to the community's learning.
